job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: strongWho We ArebrbrstrongHungryroot is your personal grocer powered by AI and the belief that food deeply impacts your daily life You tell us a little about yourself and we use proprietary predictive technology to deliver groceries and recipes that best suit your individual needs and goals We also assist with meal planning and nutritional support helping you save time save money shop sustainably and eat what makes you feel your bestbrbrWe are a distributed team built on top talent from over 10 states across the US While we have an office in NYC we support employees creating offices wherever they are We believe in fostering team connection and collaboration across all of our offices  so dont expect to be online at 6 am to make a meeting if youre on the West coast Expect to attend regular team building events and to be able to work from the beach every once in a while Expect to be treated like an owner who cares about our common goal not someone who has to clock in and out of workbrbrHungryroot is on track to earn 200M in revenue this year profitable and rapidly growing  this is why we need youbrbrstrongWhat Youll DobrbrstrongWere looking for a highly motivated problemsolving Software Engineer who is excited to play an integral role in our rapidly growing Technology team At Hungryroot we experiment iterate learn and repeat Most importantly we build things people love As a member of the Technology team you will be responsible for the development of the companys customerfacing site including various integrations with our vendorspartners as well as various internal tools necessary for our operations The ideal candidate is obsessed with delivering the best possible customer experience diligent and persistent with assigned tasks and is willing to learn quickly to constantly better oneselfbrbrstrongHow Youll Make an ImpactbrstrongulliEvaluate design and implement new features to provide the best user experience for our customersliliBuild improve and maintain our responsive eCommerce web appliliDevelop scalable backend services in key focus areas such as logistics payments and inventory managementliliIntegrate our frontend and backend with thirdparty vendors for essential operational servicesliliListen to the needs of our internal teams and build tools that help solve complex operational workflowsbrbrliulstrong Why We Need You brstrongulli2 years of professional programming experience working on commercial applicationsliliExperience using Python for backend projectsliliExperience with a web framework such as Django preferred Flask or Rails is a plusliliExperience in frontend web development with HTML CSS JavascriptliliExperience of a frontend framework such as React preferred Angular or Vue is a plusliliMotivated and resourceful able to take ownership of your tasks and seeing features through from start to finishliliA bachelors degree in Computer Science is preferredliliAlways motivated and resourceful Able to take ownership of your tasks and see features through from start to finishliliCollaborate well with teammates and be positive and constructive in communicationliliBe proactive Think slightly ahead instead of remaining reactive to foreseeable problemsliliStrive to be transparent and candid Do not intentionally hide mistakes or blame others instead find ways to prevent future mistakesbrbrliulstrongPerks amp BenefitsbrstrongulliRemote Work Optional Work from home work from our NYC office work from anywhere you decideliliCompetitive compensation  comprehensive Medical Dental and Vision benefitsliliUnlimited vacation policyliliMonthly Hungryroot creditliliUniversal paid parental leavelili401kliliCommuter benefits liliA working environment filled with passionate happy smart peoplebrbrliulemHungryroot is built on the values of being proactive positive and transparent in all that we do Our mission to help make healthy eating easy accessible and joyful is better served by a diverse workplacebrbrememWe are a proud Equal Opportunity Employer committed to building an inclusive workplace We have zerotolerance for harassment or discrimination We do not discriminate on the basis of race religion ethnicity national origin gender identity gender expression sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disabilityem
